# ShowMore Component

### ShowMore

**Exports:**
- `ShowMore` - Show more/less toggle component

**Usage:**
```svelte
<script lang="ts">
	import { ShowMore } from 'kampsy-ui';

	let isActive = $state(false);
</script>

<div class="w-full">
    <ShowMore bind:isActive />
</div>
```

## Installation

```bash
pnpm i -D kampsy-ui@latest
```

## Documentation

Visit http://ui.kampsy.xyz/show-more for full documentation and examples.
